Create or Save an OUF

Save an ODF file in the normal way by clicking Save As from the GEO menu.

Create an OUF file from that ODF by selecting Save OUF Updates from GEO menu.

Any amendments in the ODF file can then be saved into OUF format by selecting Save OUF Update from GEO menu. This at the same time will save the ODF file.

Note. Alternatively, if your e-mail software has been setup, click Send OUF updates via Mail from the GEO menu. This method also creates an OUF file with a sequentially-numbered file name, and in addition incorporates the OUF into an e-mail as the correctly named file-attachment.

Tip. Do not rename OUF files. GEO gives the OUF the same filename as its PARENT ODF together with its sequence number.
